pageProduct.name: QV Face Oil Free Moisturiser 75G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Face Oil Free moisturiser is specifically formulated to minimise shine and help keep oily and combination skin feeling hydrated and fresh throughout the day. This gentle and calming  moisturiser contains vitamin B3 and pro-vitamin B5 to help keep the delicate skin of the face hydrated for 24 hours.

Warnings

CAUTION:
For external use only.  If irritation occurs, wash affected area and discontinue use.  Store below 30°C.
Always read the label and use only as directed. 
If symptoms persist see a healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Suitable for oily & acne prone skin
• Hydrating, oil free, non-comedogenic formula that won’t block pores
• Fragrance & colour free
• Dermatologically tested
• Suitable for sensitive skin
• Minimises shine, provides matte finish

Ingredients

Aqua (water), Cyclopentasiloxane (and) Cyclohexasiloxane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Aluminium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Glycerine, Niacinamine, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ceteareth-20, Panthenol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid.

Directions

Apply to the face and neck after cleansing. Use in conjunction with QV Face Gentle Foaming Cleanser for a gentle way to cleanse and moisturise the skin.
